Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the visa officer's decision to deny the study permit was manifestly unreasonable
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Officer found applicant's intent to leave Canada questionable
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Alleged bias and ignored evidence by visa officer
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Applicant's academic performance and intent to depart Canada
Crimes.Evidence_Ignored: Claimed by applicant, not accepted by court
Crimes.Application_Factor: Intent to leave Canada after studies
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Reasonableness of refusal based on intent and credibility
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Concerns about intent to leave Canada and academic performance
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Applicant alleged ignored evidence; court found otherwise
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Doubts about genuine intent to study and return home

Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the visa officer's decision to deny the study permit was manifestly unreasonable
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Officer questioned applicant’s credibility due to past violations
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Allegation that officer made arbitrary conclusions
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: History of non-compliance and weak ties to home country
Crimes.Application_Error: Failure to disclose prior refusals or overstays
Crimes.Application_Factor: Intent to return home after studies
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Reasonableness of refusal based on credibility and compliance history
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Multiple failed courses, absenteeism, lack of strong ties to home country
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Doubtful intent to comply with conditions

Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the visa officer’s refusal was patently unreasonable
Crimes.Application_Facts: Applicant remained in Canada without status after authorization expired
Crimes.Defendant_Behavior: Remained in Canada beyond authorized period
Crimes.Assessment_Factor: Compliance with immigration laws, intent to leave Canada
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Officer doubted genuine intent to study and depart
Crimes.Evidence_Assessed: Prior conduct indicating lack of compliance
Crimes.Governing_Rule: IRPA sections related to temporary residence and compliance
Crimes.Cause_Description: Concerns about intentions and ability to comply with Canadian immigration laws
Crimes.Evidence_Handling: All relevant evidence considered by officer
Crimes.Misrepresentation_Element: Implied through failure to disclose or justify overstay
Crimes.Evidence_Assessment: Officer reasonably assessed risk of non-departure
Crimes.Decision_Rationale: Risk of non-compliance with future conditions

Crimes.Crime_Name: Work Permit Refusal under Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the visa officer's decision to deny the study permit was manifestly unreasonable
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Officer doubted applicant’s intent to return home
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Allegation that decision lacked evidentiary basis
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Applicant’s history of non-compliance and academic issues
Crimes.Application_Error: Failure to demonstrate genuine student intent
Crimes.Application_Factor: Intent to return to home country after studies
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Reasonableness of refusal based on credibility and compliance
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Concerns about academic performance and intent to return home
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Officer relied on documented academic and compliance issues
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Doubt about sincerity of study plans
